name: Shazam
description: Identify any song. Discover, artists, lyrics, videos & playlists to create a song detector site/application such as shazam.com

api_methods.name: songs/get-count
api_methods.description: Get total times the specific song is detected/shazamed by using .../songs/detect or .../songs/v2/detect endpoint

parameters.name: key
parameters.description: The key field returned from .../songs/detect or .../search endpoint

utterances.utterance: Can you tell me how many times 'Blinding Lights' by The Weeknd has been identified using the song detector?
Find out the total number of detections for the song with the key 40333609 from the latest chart-topper.
I want to know how often the track linked to key 40333609 has been recognized by the music app.
Please check the detection count for the song associated with key 40333609 and let me know.
How many times has the song identified by key 40333609 been shazamed worldwide?
Get the total detection number for the song that matches key 40333609 from the music recognition service.
Could you retrieve the count of times the song with key 40333609 has been detected by the app?
Tell me the total times the song identified by key 40333609 has been recognized by the song detector.
I need the detection statistics for the track linked to key 40333609, please provide the total count.
Look up how many times the song with the key 40333609 has been detected by the music identification system.
